forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, turning to a wind driven steady rain for the afternoon with a few thunderstorms possible. High 14C. SE winds at 15 to 25 km/h, increasing to 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, turning to a wind driven steady rain for the afternoon with a few thunderstorms possible. High 59F. Winds SE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers, with winds diminishing overnight. Low near 50F. W winds at 25 to 35 mph, decreasing to 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
